title: Nice Wine
content:
…and nice label. It must be hand lettered. Unfortunately it was glued so hard it didn't want to come off the bottle, so I scanned the bottle.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019091530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chateau2_5859.gif)
author: mili

comments.content:
great label - i think both the typography and illustration are entirely hand made, then scanned, slightly processed and printed on this label.  
a few years ago i had the same try - almost entirely hand made label - it is uploaded here:

[http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Hand-Made-Wine-Label--SHIRAZ/50138](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019091530/http:/www.behance.net/Gallery/Hand-Made-Wine-Label--SHIRAZ/50138 "http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Hand-Made-Wine-Label--SHIRAZ/50138")

 [www.behance.net/epixs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019091530/http:/www.behance.net/epixs "www.behance.net/epixs")
Jordan, your Shiraz label is very nice. Hope the liquid inside is worth the design!
